function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Study conducted during first wave of COVID-19","Impact":"Findings may not be applicable to current COVID-19 situation with vaccines","Mitigation":"Conduct further studies during different stages of COVID-19","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Research team, construction workers","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Sample comes from a subset of Chilean construction stakeholders","Impact":"Not all construction stakeholders may have been included in the study","Mitigation":"Conduct interviews until saturation point to minimize missing stakeholders","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Research team","Owner":"Research team"}]}
